description: A start flow created along with the agent

text: Hi! Nabi here. How are you doing?
Hello! How can Nabi help you?

Greetings! Nabi here. How can I assist?
Your best collaborative robot, Nabi, is here! How can I help you?
I am Nabi, a collaborative robot built by NabiTech LLC in partnership with TUP Manila using advanced robotic simulations and AI. Would you like to know more about me?
Okay, tell me if you need any help!
Okay, I'm here if you have any questions!
Okay! Let me know if you need something!
Just give me a heads up if you need anything!
